TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务是否以与 ASP.NET 兼容的模式运行或是否可以运行。

span.span: Specifies whether a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service runs, or can run, in a mode that is compatible with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 兼容模式允许 WCF 服务使用诸如标识模拟等 ASP 功能。ASP.NET compatibility mode allows WCF services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation. 该服务是通过 Web.config 文件在应用程序级别启用的，并且无法由嵌套在应用程序中的 Web.config 文件重写。It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application. 如果 `AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode` 没有为服务指定值，则默认值为 `Allowed` 。When the `AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode` value is not specified for a service, the default is `Allowed`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ < serviceHostingEnvironment > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment). ## Examples 服务开发人员可以通过将属性设置为，确保其服务仅在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下运行 `Required` ，如下面的示例中所示：Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property to `Required`, as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Allowed = int32(1)

summary.span: WCF 服务可以在 ASP.NET 兼容模式设置为或的应用程序域中运行 。

span.span: WCF services can run in an application domain with ASP.NET compatibility mode set to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode NotAllowed = int32(0)

summary.span: WCF 服务必须在 ASP.NET 兼容模式设置为的应用程序域中运行 。

span.span: WCF services must run in an application domain with ASP.NET compatibility mode set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Required = int32(2)

summary.span: WCF 服务必须在 ASP.NET 兼容模式设置为的应用程序域中运行 。

span.span: WCF services must run in an application domain with ASP.NET compatibility mode set to .
